full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA RGYANG 'BOD BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA DANG SBYAR BA THAR 'DOD NYE LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
